dns_providers.title: DNS
dns_providers.custom_ip_hint: Enter the DNS server addresses from your provider or another DNS service.
dns_providers.custom_ip_typo: Check the address — looks like there's a typo
dns_providers.custom_ip_unreachable: Server not responding — check the address or try a different one
dns_providers.custom_ip_ipv6_only_warning: IPv6 only protects part of the traffic. Add IPv4 for full protection.

general.close_minimize_desc: The app will continue running in the system tray

about.title: About
about.author: Author
changes: Speed Test powered by M-Lab NDT7
UI polish: new font, refined icons and styling

tools.speed_test_desc: Check what your internet can handle

vpn.title: VPN
vpn.disabled_desc: Internet traffic is not routed through VPN
vpn.supported_formats: Supports VLESS, Shadowsocks, Trojan, WireGuard, Outline
vpn.key_hint: Enter the VPN key or link from your provider. Supported: VLESS, VMess, Shadowsocks, Trojan, WireGuard, Outline
vpn.key_hint_edit: Replace the VPN key or link for this server
vpn.supported_full: Supported: VLESS, VMess, Shadowsocks, Trojan, WireGuard, Outline
vpn.elevation_denied_desc: VPN requires administrator permissions. Please allow the prompt.
vpn.connection_failed_desc: Could not establish VPN connection. Check your key and try again.
vpn.server_unreachable: Server is not responding. The key may not work.
vpn.duplicate_server: A server with this address already exists
vpn.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this server?

speed_test.title: Speed test
speed_test.tooltip_ping: Response time when network is idle. Lower is better. Up to 20ms is excellent, up to 50ms is good.
speed_test.tooltip_latency: Response time under load (when downloading). If much higher than Ping, network gets congested during active use.
speed_test.tooltip_jitter: How stable the ping is. High jitter = stutters and freezes in games and video calls. Up to 5ms is excellent.
speed_test.warning_high_latency_desc: Latency {{latency}}ms while Ping is {{ping}}ms — under load, delay increases {{ratio}}x. Video calls will stutter when someone downloads files.
speed_test.warning_low_speed_desc: Download {{download}} Mbps — 4K video will buffer. Upload {{upload}} Mbps — video calls may stutter.
speed_test.warning_unstable_desc: Jitter {{jitter}}ms — connection is unstable. You may experience freezes in games and video calls.
speed_test.error_no_server: Could not find a test server. Check your internet connection.
speed_test.error_test_failed: Speed test failed. Please try again.
speed_test.error_rate_limited: Too many tests in a row. Please wait a few minutes.
speed_test.error_connection: Could not connect to the server. Check your connection.

wifi_disabled.title: Wi-Fi Disabled
wifi_disabled.message: The Wi-Fi adapter is turned off on your computer.
wifi_disabled.action: Turn on Wi-Fi in Windows settings or press the Wi-Fi toggle on your laptop.

wifi_not_connected.title: Not Connected
wifi_not_connected.message: Your computer is not connected to a Wi-Fi network.
wifi_not_connected.action: Open the network list, select your network, and connect.

router_unreachable.title: Router Unreachable
router_unreachable.message: The signal is not reaching your router.
router_unreachable.action: Check if your router is powered on and its indicator lights are on. Try restarting it.

no_internet.title: No Internet
no_internet.message: The router is working, but there is no internet access.
no_internet.action: Restart your router — turn it off for 10 seconds and turn it back on. If that doesn't help, call your provider.

dns_failure.title: DNS Problem
dns_failure.action: Try enabling DNS protection in Netok settings — this may fix the issue.

http_blocked.title: Websites Unavailable
http_blocked.message: There is a connection, but websites won't open.
http_blocked.action: If you're using a VPN, try disabling it. Also check your antivirus settings.

weak_signal.title: Weak Signal
weak_signal.message: Wi-Fi is working, but the signal is weak — dropouts are possible.
weak_signal.action: Move closer to your router or remove obstacles between it and your computer.

wifi_security.title: Security
wifi_security.encryption_danger: Network is not encrypted. Your traffic can be intercepted by others nearby
wifi_security.evil_twin_warning: Suspicious copy of this network without encryption detected. Someone may be trying to intercept traffic
wifi_security.arp_warning: Suspicious activity in the network — possible traffic interception
wifi_security.arp_danger: Traffic interception attempt detected. Do not enter passwords or open banking apps
wifi_security.dns_safe: DNS is working correctly — websites open at real addresses
wifi_security.dns_warning: This network may be spoofing website addresses. Enable DNS protection in Netok settings
